text: Julia was 5x too slow due to misplaced `@simd`

text: I suppose it's fair to complain if other languages infer `@simd` elegantly and in Julia you have to figure out how exactly to use it, but in my experience the reasons for not simply doing these things by default are often too easily dismissed
